name: Exchange_refresh_token_for_access_token
description: Use the `refresh_token` to get a new `access_token` without asking the user to re-authenticate. The `access_token` is valid for 3 months before it needs to be refreshed again. #### JSON POST Data | Key | Type | Value | |---|---|---| | `refresh_token` * | string | Saved from the initial token method. | | `client_id` * | string | Get this from your app settings. | | `client_secret` * | string | Get this from your app settings. | | `redirect_uri` * | string | URI specified in your app settings. | | `grant_type` * | string | `refresh_token` |
